Description:
One of our clients is the leading in (Real Estate industry ) ,they are Looking for a Real Estate Agent in Riyadh,KSAResponsibilitiesAdvise clients on market conditions, prices, mortgages, and legal requirements.
Obtain agreements from secondary market property owners to place properties for sale within UHNW residential communities and developments.
Prepare documents such as the listing forms, marketing addendums and
requirements, in accordance with Sales Administration policies.
Coordinate appointments to show properties to prospective buyers.
Accompany buyers during visits to and inspections of properties, advising them on the suitability and value of the homes they are visiting.
Present purchase offers to sellers for consideration Skills
Skills:
Must Have a Minimum of 4+ years of Real Estate Brokerage Experience in the UAE/KSA/MENA Region.
The candidates need to have a good broker network/ relationship with clients/ clientele list of UHNI’s.
Need to be polished, fluent in English, good at communication, and presentable.
Needs to have the capability of conversing with UHNI’s.
Background – Good real estate companies.
Achieve above industry sales targets/KPIs set by the Head of Sales.
